@scATX ie. I agree that it's profoundly sad—But I'm not surprised that there's people in GG management that are likely anti-woman.
.@scATX inviting girls to adult events, is done either to hide the absence of grown women, or to overshadow their participation.
.@scATX I think sexism is often disguised as support for (young) girls; in a circuitous way of oppressing grown women. 1/2
